response.original_title: Laurel And Hardy's Road To Laughter
response.overview: Documentary about the early lives and careers of Stan Laurel & Oliver Hardy. From their childhood roots to their solo stage & film careers and up to their teaming at Hal Roach studios.
response.tagline: No other documentary has ever told their early stories in so much detail.
response.title: Laurel And Hardy's Road To Laughter
